column2: BRIEF-Webster Financial Corporation Increases Common Dividend To $0.33 April 23 (Reuters) - Webster Financial Corp: * DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.33 PER SHARE ON ITS COMMON STOCK, AN INCREASE OF $0.07 FROM PREVIOUS $0.26 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Webster Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.85 April 19 (Reuters) - Webster Financial Corp: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.79 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY REVENUE OF $282.9 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 10.6 PERCENT FROM A YEAR AGO * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $214.2 MILLION COMPARED TO $192.7 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $209.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
